name: Adventurer
ability: On your first night, the Storyteller sends you on an adventure. If you complete the adventure, you receive a piece of advice from the Storyteller than night.
flavor: Adventure time! Come on, grab your friends. We'll go to very distant lands.

otherNightReminder: The Bloodletter points to a player. That player dies. If that player is a Minion, mark that player with the "Dead" and "+1 attack" reminders (that player is the only player to die tonight). Otherwise, allow the Bloodletter to point to and kill an additonal player for each "+1 attack" reminder in play.
name: Bloodletter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. For each Minion killed this way, you may choose an additional player each night (a chosen Minion is the only player to die that night).
flavor: Your sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed during the day: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed during the day, choose a player: they die.
flavor: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone.

otherNightReminder: If the Crybaby is not marked with the "Chosen" reminder, they die.
name: Crybaby
ability: Each night*, if you are not chosen by another player with their ability, you die.
flavor: I'm not addicted to attention. Anyway, listen to this...

firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are neighboring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the "Spoken" reminder, they die.
name: Earworm
ability: You start knowing a secret word. The first good character to say that word dies the following night. When someone dies this way, you learn a new word.
flavor: Would you like to know a deadly secret?

firstNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
otherNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
name: Glutton
ability: Each night, a Minion acts twice, even if you are dead.
flavor: I think I'll have another.

name: Jailbird
ability: If either of your living neighbors die, you might die that night. If you die, one of your living neighbors might die that night.
flavor: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected players are no longer protected. The Martyr points to two players. Mark those players with the "Protected" reminder.
name: Martyr
ability: Each night*, choose two players: if the Demon kills either tonight, you die instead.
flavor: My sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: The Mind Flayer points to a player. That player dies. Show the Mind Flayer that player's character token. If the Mind Flayer chooses, move the "Has ability" reminder to that player.
name: Mind Flayer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a living player dies this way, you learn their character and may choose to gain their ability. You may only have one additional ability at a time.
flavor: I'm sure if we bashed your head in, all sorts of secrets would come tumbling out...

firstNightReminder: Mark one Mitosis with the "1st" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to other Mitosis. Mark the other Mitosis with the "2nd" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to first Mitosis.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mitosis marked with the "1st" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies. Wake the Mitosis marked with the "2nd" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies.
name: Mitosis
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. There are two Mitosis in play and good must kill both to win. You know the other Mitosis. [-1 Minion]
flavor: Life finds a way.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of deaths prevented tonight.
name: Mortician
ability: Each night*, you learn how many deaths were prevented during the night.
flavor: The body keeps the score.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Night Hunter and Minions. The Night Hunter points to a player. That player dies.
name: Night Hunter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You and your Minions always wake up together.
flavor: I don't always tell people where I hunt, but when I do, it's a lie.

name: Patsy
ability: If the Demon dies, you die instead.
flavor: You've got the wrong guy!

firstNightReminder: Show the "This is the Demon" card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are mad that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even when dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

name: Revenant
ability: You may nominate even if dead.
flavor: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight. You breathe. Keep breathing. When there is a storm and you stand in front of a tree, if you look at its branches, you swear it will fall. But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.

firstNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
otherNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
name: Scourge
ability: Each night, choose to mark two players or kill all marked players (players die in the order in which they were marked.
flavor: Some stains don't wash off.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Scribe and point to the player with the "Chosen" reminder.
name: Scribe
ability: Each night*, learn 1 player chosen by the Demon (or that no one was chosen).
flavor: To write is to be eternal, omnipresent.

name: Sheriff
ability: One of your Townsfolk neighbors is drunk. Your Townsfolk neighbors cannot be killed by the Demon.
flavor: Come with me if you want to live.

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player would die, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

firstNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
otherNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they would wake tonight, they are drunk and you gain their ability until dusk. If you choose an evil player, you become evil and lose your ability.
flavor: I know how to get things.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder. If a player is marked with the "Talked" reminder, ask the Succubus if they want that player to die.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, you may choose to kill them that night.
flavor: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of 2 not-in-play characters
name: Urchin
ability: You start knowing 2 not-in-play characters.
flavor: The streets speak.

firstNightReminder: The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Vodou
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tongith and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Chosen" reminder, show the "This character selected you" card, then the Whaler token. If the Demon doesn't kill a Minion tonight, a Minion dies immediately after the Demon acts.
name: Whaler
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately visit the Storyteller and choose a player. If you choose the Demon, that night the Demon learns this and a Minion dies.
flavor: Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee.

otherNightReminder: If the Zealot died tonight and a Townsfolk is dead: a dead Townsfolk is now alive.
name: Zealot
ability: If you die at night, a dead Townsfolk is resurrected.
flavor: I long for combat.
